mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the articles entitled "Just How Much Style", "Cheating's Fun or Odd Couple? Oh!", "Shall We Hash the Singing Calls?", "The Yo-Yo Club", This edition also includes the monthly articles entitled "On the Record", "The Square of the Month", "For the Caller: Behind the Mike", "Round the Outside Ring" and "From the Floor" (letters to the editor). The article "Just How Much Style" is a featured article about finding a good dancing pace that works for specific clubs so that everyone enjoys the dances.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
